title: pAhimAm pArvati
sahitya:
pAhimAm pArvati paramEshvari shrI


anupallavi

 mOhana sundara svarUpiNi shankari mOdaka kara guruguha bhaktajanAvana shankari


caraNam   pancAnana hrdayEshvari paramEshvara mOhini sarvEshvari sarvAnandamaya cakra vAsini 
vAnchitArttha phala pradAyini vArijAsanAdinuta caraNa naLina sampradAya kulOttIrNa yOgini
